long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Google Drive Quick Search is a powerful yet simple Google Chrome extension that allows you to search your Google Drive with live results without leaving the address bar. Save time and enhance your productivity by finding your documents and folders quickly and easily.

Key Features:

Instant Drive Search: Type 'drive' followed by the Tab button in the address bar to initiate a search in your Google Drive. Get live search results as you type, displaying matching documents and folders instantly.

Seamless Integration: Google Drive Quick Search integrates seamlessly with your browser, making it a natural part of your browsing experience. No need to switch between tabs or windows; find what you're looking for directly from the address bar.
Easy Setup: With minimal setup required, simply grant the read-only Google Drive API access for your current account, and you're ready to go. Your privacy and security are our top priorities, so rest assured that your data remains protected.

Efficient Workflow: Boost your productivity by reducing the time spent navigating through your Google Drive. Quickly locate and access the files and folders you need with just a few keystrokes.

Lightweight and Fast: Google Drive Quick Search is designed to be lightweight and fast, ensuring it doesn't slow down your browsing experience or interfere with other extensions.

Experience a new level of convenience and efficiency with Google Drive Quick Search – your ultimate Google Drive search companion. Try it today and revolutionize the way you search and access your files on Google Drive.
